org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode

Class JournalSet.JournalSetOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.EditLogOutputStream
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.namenode.JournalSet.JournalSetOutputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Enclosing class:
    JournalSet

    private class JournalSet.JournalSetOutputStream
extends EditLogOutputStream
    An implementation of EditLogOutputStream that applies a requested method on all the journals that are currently active.

        public void writeRaw(byte[] data,
            int offset,
            int length)
              throws IOException
        Description copied from class: EditLogOutputStream
        Write raw data to an edit log. This data should already have the transaction ID, checksum, etc included. It is for use within the BackupNode when replicating edits from the NameNode.
        Specified by:
        writeRaw in class EditLogOutputStream
        Parameters:
        data - the bytes to write.
        offset - offset in the bytes to write from
        length - number of bytes to write

        public void setReadyToFlush()
                     throws IOException
        Description copied from class: EditLogOutputStream
        All data that has been written to the stream so far will be flushed. New data can be still written to the stream while flushing is performed.
